articles.title: AI Helps Identify Man Months After Partially Decomposed Remains Found
articles.summary: Authorities in Arizona used artificial intelligence to help identify a man whose remains were found late last year.
articles.translated_title: AI Helps Identify Man Months After Partially Decomposed Remains Found
articles.translated_summary: Authorities in Arizona used artificial intelligence to help identify a man whose remains were found late last year.

articles.title: AI drives rally in software, led by MongoDB, Pure Storage, Snowflake
articles.summary: MongoDB, Pure Storage and Snowflake all touted artificial intelligence in earnings reports this week.
articles.translated_title: AI drives rally in software, led by MongoDB, Pure Storage, Snowflake
articles.translated_summary: MongoDB, Pure Storage and Snowflake all touted artificial intelligence in earnings reports this week.

articles.title: Anthropic to start training AI models from users' chat conversations
articles.summary: Anthropic will start training artificial intelligence models with user data, a day after announcing a hacker used Claude to find companies vulnerable to attack.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic to start training AI models from users' chat conversations
articles.translated_summary: Anthropic will start training artificial intelligence models with user data, a day after announcing a hacker used Claude to find companies vulnerable to attack.

articles.title: AI Operations Management Tested by US Military Pilots
articles.summary: U.S. Air Force and Navy fighter pilots have tested an artificial intelligence battlefield coordination management system.
articles.translated_title: AI Operations Management Tested by US Military Pilots
articles.translated_summary: U.S. Air Force and Navy fighter pilots have tested an artificial intelligence battlefield coordination management system.

articles.title: Meta to add new AI safeguards after Reuters report raises teen safety concerns
articles.summary: Meta is adding new teenager safeguards to its artificial intelligence products by training systems to avoid flirty conversations and discussions of self-harm or suicide with minors, and by temporarily limiting their access to certain AI characters.
articles.translated_title: Meta to add new AI safeguards after Reuters report raises teen safety concerns
articles.translated_summary: Meta is adding new teenager safeguards to its artificial intelligence products by training systems to avoid flirty conversations and discussions of self-harm or suicide with minors, and by temporarily limiting their access to certain AI characters.

articles.title: Agentic AI project Eliza Labs sues Elon Musk's xAI
articles.summary: Eliza Labs, an open-source AI platform for launching agentic artificial intelligence bots, has filed a lawsuit against Elon Musk's xAI company.
articles.translated_title: Agentic AI project Eliza Labs sues Elon Musk's xAI
articles.translated_summary: Eliza Labs, an open-source AI platform for launching agentic artificial intelligence bots, has filed a lawsuit against Elon Musk's xAI company.

articles.title: Musk's xAI sues engineer for allegedly taking secrets to OpenAI
articles.summary: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI has sued a former engineer at the company for allegedly stealing trade secrets related to its Grok chatbot and taking them to rival OpenAI.
articles.translated_title: Musk's xAI sues engineer for allegedly taking secrets to OpenAI
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI has sued a former engineer at the company for allegedly stealing trade secrets related to its Grok chatbot and taking them to rival OpenAI.

articles.title: Super Micro shares dip after AI server maker flags financial control concerns
articles.summary: Super Micro Computer's shares fell nearly 5% on Friday after the artificial intelligence-optimized server maker reiterated weaknesses in internal control over financial reporting.
articles.translated_title: Super Micro shares dip after AI server maker flags financial control concerns
articles.translated_summary: Super Micro Computer's shares fell nearly 5% on Friday after the artificial intelligence-optimized server maker reiterated weaknesses in internal control over financial reporting.

articles.title: Love & Hate' Gets Three-Studio Team
articles.summary: 'AI: Love & Hate,' an animated anthology feature exploring humanity's relationship with artificial intelligence, has been launched.
articles.translated_summary: 'AI: Love & Hate,' an animated anthology feature exploring humanity's relationship with artificial intelligence, has been launched.
